00065 template <class Interface>
00066 void TMultiReferenceMember<Interface>::Init(const IComponent* ownerPtr, const IRealAttributeStaticInfo& staticInfo)
00067 {
00068        BaseClass::Init(ownerPtr, staticInfo, &m_definitionComponentPtr);
00069 
00070        m_components.clear();

00074 template <class Interface>
00075 bool TMultiReferenceMember<Interface>::IsValid() const
00076 {
00077        return EnsureInitialized();
00078 }

00081 template <class Interface>
00082 Interface* TMultiReferenceMember<Interface>::operator[](int index) const
00083 {
00084        I_ASSERT(index >= 0);
00085 
00086        EnsureInitialized();
00087 
00088        I_ASSERT(index < int(m_components.size()));
00089 
00090        return m_components[index];
00091 }

00106 template <class Interface>
00107 bool TMultiReferenceMember<Interface>::EnsureInitialized() const
00108 {
00109        bool retVal = false;
00110 
00111        if (!m_isInitialized && (m_definitionComponentPtr != NULL) && BaseClass::IsValid()){
00112               const ICompositeComponent* parentPtr = m_definitionComponentPtr->GetParentComponent();
00113               if (parentPtr != NULL){
00114                      int attributesCount = BaseClass::GetCount();
00115 
00116                      m_components.resize(attributesCount);
00117 
00118                      retVal = true;
00119 
00120                      for (int i = 0; i < attributesCount; ++i){
00121                             const QByteArray& componentId = BaseClass::operator[](i);
00122 
00123                             QByteArray baseId;
00124                             QByteArray subId;
00125                             BaseClass2::SplitId(componentId, baseId, subId);
00126 
00127                             IComponent* componentPtr = parentPtr->GetSubcomponent(baseId);
00128 
00129                             m_components[i] = BaseClass2::ExtractInterface<Interface>(componentPtr, subId);
00130                      }
00131 
00132                      m_isInitialized = retVal;
00133               }
00134        }
00135 
00136        return m_isInitialized;
00137 }
